plot: The perfect plan, the perfect suicide: a gun, a rope and pills. But this plan has one weakness: a little parrot called Fipsi.
title: Der perfekte Plan
plot_es: The perfect plan, the perfect suicide: a gun, a rope and pills. But this plan has one weakness: a little parrot called Fipsi.
plot_en: The perfect plan, the perfect suicide: a gun, a rope and pills. But this plan has one weakness: a little parrot called Fipsi.
